title: Calories in Chicken Wingette
meta_description: Discover calories in chicken wingette, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per wingette, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.
assumptions: With skin, roasted; average size ~40g, no added sauces or breading.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, cooking method, brand, and seasonings. Check labels or sources for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One roasted chicken wingette with skin provides ~85 kcal and ~7 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one chicken wingette?
faqs.a: About 85 kcal for a roasted wingette with skin (~40g).

faqs.q: What's the protein in a chicken wingette?
faqs.a: Roughly 7 g protein per roasted wingette.

faqs.q: Are chicken wingettes high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, ~6 g total fat per wingette, mostly from skin; skinless reduces it significantly.

faqs.q: Calories in fried vs. baked chicken wingette?
faqs.a: Fried adds ~50 kcal due to oil absorption, totaling ~135 kcal.

faqs.q: Does size affect calories in chicken wingette?
faqs.a: Yes, larger wingettes (~50g) may have 100+ kcal; adjust based on weight.
